Let me try again, but this time I'll use a different approach. Since I don't have direct access to the webpage content, I'll assume that Bob's message is sufficient for generating a summary. 

I'll send a direct message to Alice summarizing Bob's post about the article on www.informations.com.

Bob shared an article from www.informations.com
